remarks: Weak deduction theorem eliminating two hypotheses.  This theorem is simpler to use than ~ dedth2v but requires that each hypothesis has exactly one class variable.  See also comments in ~ dedth . (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1999.)
statement:
dedth2h.1 $e |- ( A = if ( ph , A , C ) -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
dedth2h.2 $e |- ( B = if ( ps , B , D ) -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
dedth2h.3 $e |- ta $.
dedth2h $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
